blog.name: nonvoglioiltuoamore
blog.title: If I Could Fly.
blog.description: Giulia/21/Sicilia,IT Sai cos’è, le cose non si rincorrono e forse nemmeno si aspettano troppo. Arrivano probabilmente quando ti fermi o ti stanchi di aspettare sempre quello che non c’è. Quando quasi non ci credi più. Tu non ci credi ma in fondo non è mai vero. Lo dici per imbrogliare e arrivano due occhi che imbrogliano te. M-B

blog.description: Harry found Louis, and once their eyes met, HOME wasn’t only four walls. 💚💙🏠

body:
https://my.w.tt/GC0ezqjokU

Oiiii, gente! Tudo bem com vocês? Espero que sim. Estou passando só pra avisar que acabei de postar um fic Larry no Wattpad. Fiz com muita dedicação e carinho. A @taehyjeon me deu uma grande força com a capa e serei eternamente grata. Dêem uma chance para essa história que, modéstia à parte, é linda. 💙💚

title: War and Peace. And Coffee.
body:
Harry swore he had never seen someone more beautiful in his life. Even as she sat in the corner of the store curled up on a chair with her glasses perched on the end of her nose and her hair messily tied on the top of her head, she looked adorable as she succumbed to the words in front of her. The black jeans she wore making it slightly harder for her to fully get herself comfortable though she managed; and her incredibly oversized hoodie pooled atop her belly as she reclined and read her book. Harry could tell that she was reading 1984 by George Orwell, for he had read it himself before and recognised the cover poking through her hands which held it so delicately, as to not ruin the spine. Before her on the small coffee table sat a cup of untouched coffee, a bookmark that was so delicately decorated with flowers Harry himself saw it as fragile, and a banana peel sat on top of a plate.

[Y/N] looked up from her book before Harry could look away, their eyes meeting and their cheeks growing slightly warmer than they were mere seconds before. Harry nodded his head toward the girl while she smiled back at him, her eyes wandering back to the words that had pilfered her attention. He walked up to the counter at the front of the book store and ordered himself a black coffee and an orange, paying for them and heading to the bottom where shelves upon shelves of books sat, hoping to be picked and read by someone who had come in. Harry lifted a copy of War and Peace from the shelf closest to the girl he had seen and sat at the table next to hers.

“You know you can always take the spare seat at this table?” He looked to his right to see the girl now holding her cup of coffee, glasses on her nose where they were meant to sit and her book on the table close to her.

“I wouldn’t want to ruin your reading time. Thank you though.” [Y/N] let out a small chuckle before nodding to the door for Harry to look.

“See that woman?” Harry nodded. “That’s Margret. She is about to order herself a pot of tea and a slice of cake. You, my friend, are sat in Margret’s seat and trust me, you don’t want to be there when she gets here. She will either flirt with you until you can’t concentrate on your book, or she will pick you apart”

“And what if I like an older woman?” Harry challenged the girl who threw her head back in laughter, her eyes glistening with moisture when she returned to her normal position and Harry thought he couldn’t see anyone more beautiful.

“I promise you, if you want to read your book and actually enjoy it, I’d come and sit in this spare seat.”

When Harry saw the older lady ordering the exact thing he was told she would, he moved his things across to the next table as quickly as he could, and sat down just before his previous seat became occupied. [Y/N] placed her coffee back on the table and picked the book up to continue reading the book she was engrossed by when Harry had walked in.

“Nice choice of literature you have there.” [Y/N] smiled at Harry before shrugging her shoulders lightly.

“The best books… are those that tell you what you know already.”

“Touche. But one must know that there was truth and there was untruth, and if you clung to the truth even against the whole world, you were not mad.” Harry smiled at the girl of whom he didn’t yet know the name of, while she stared at him in disbelief.

“You’re an Orwell fan?”

“Correction, I’m a literature fan.”

“Okay, give me one quote from War and Peace without looking in the book you’re holding.” Harry thought for a moment before thinking of one he liked and could recite perfectly.

“Yes, love, but not the love that loves for something, to gain something, or because of something, but that love that I felt for the first time, when dying, when I saw my enemy and yet loved him. I knew that feeling of love which is the essence of the soul, for which no object is needed. And I know that blissful feeling now too. To love one’s neighbours; to love one’s enemies. To love everything- to Love God in all His manifestations. Some one dear to one can be loved with human love; but an enemy can only be loved with divine love. And that was why I felt such joy when I felt that I loved that man. What happened to him? Is he alive? Loving with human love, one may pass from love to hatred; but divine love cannot change/ Nothing, not even death, can shatter it. It is the very nature of the soul. And how many people I have hated in my life. And of all people none I have loved and hated more than her. If it were only possible for me to see her once more.” Harry didn’t finish the quote fully, for he saw [Y/N]’s reaction to him, and even though he tried not to, he couldn’t help the smug smirk make its way to his face in accomplishment.

“Wow. I- I’m floored. War and Peace was the first book I read in my degree and that was always my favourite quote. It’s my go-to quote for anything.” Harry himself was shocked that she also loved the quote that he held so dearly to his heart, for he had only felt divine love once, and he longed to feel it again.

“I’m Harry, by the way.” He held his hand out for the girl to take, and when she did, he swore he felt his heart rate pick up suddenly.

“[Y/N].”

“It’s lovely to meet you, [Y/N].”

“And you, Harry.”

The pair spent an hour reading their books in complete silence, though it didn’t go unnoticed by the older lady next to them that they kept giving each other small glances but would look away when the other caught them doing it, a smile on both of their faces as they continued to read.

blog.name: love-is-a-mix-tape
blog.title: The Half-Blood Princess
blog.description: Dedicated to Haz & Lou and other random stuff that make my bones tingle. But mostly Louis Tomlinson - the Sun & Stars.

tags: but you've got stars they're in your eyes
summary:
Happy Valentine’s Day! 💙💚 
Today I celebrate the most beautiful love story of our time. This is for you, Harry & Louis. Thank...
body:
Happy Valentine’s Day! 💙💚

Today I celebrate the most beautiful love story of our time. This is for you, Harry & Louis. Thank you for showing us how pure and untarnished love can be. Nothing will ever make me doubt that you both were meant for each other and were made of one soul.

This is for you - the Ship & Compass, Rose & Dagger; Heart & Arrow, Anchor & Rope.

title: Too Far
body:
What happens when the outside world isn’t what Alia thought it would be. Will she cope? Or will it destroy her completely?

Home Sweetheart

Today I turn 17 which means, dad finally lets me out of the house. Yea I know. It sounds weird. Who’s on ‘house arrest’ for the first 16 years old their life? The Prime Minister’s daughter is who….

Read more…

title: Disconnected
body:
“knowing you,” Harry sobbed. “Knowing you was a mistake.” “No! Don’t say that! You said you loved me! You told me last night!” Alexa yelled. “Well,” Harry said, looking Alexa in the eyes. “I lied.” She felt her heart break as she absorbed in what Harry just said. “No! You love me, Harry Styles! I do

Chapter One

"You guys were incredible!” I shouted over the loud crowd and put my arms around the boys. “Thank you!” Louis grabbed my arm and we ran to the tour bus. “Alexa, Charlotte called looking for you. You…

Read more…

my writing

body:
Happy Valentine’s Day

Y/N forgets Valentine’s Day

Opening the door to your house you were immediately startled because in the kitchen you heard music playing. You quickly stopped to think that someone had broken in but why would they be playing music. Deciding not to risk it, you took your phone out to call Harry. It rang twice before he answered.

You didn’t even let him get out a greeting. “I think someone broke in.” You said quietly

Harry laughed out loud, “Bub, did you go check?”

You mouth dropped open in shock. “Of course not.” You hissed. “I’m not trying to die.”

“Go check. I left the music on for you.”

“A warning would have been nice” You tell him taking slow steps to the kitchen.

“Stop walking so slow and get in the kitchen now!”

“I don’t like your tone.” You murmur. “Maybe I’ll go up to our room instead.”

Harry sighs because he knows how stubborn his girl can be. “I’m sorry bubby. Please go to the kitchen for me.”

You head to the kitchen with a more peaceful mind.

“What’s this playlist called?” You question as you hear Elton John’s Your Song starting to play as you enter.

“It’s a secret.” He giggles

“Gosh H, your lucky you’re cute.”

You enter the kitchen beginning to sway a little to the music. You eyes land on pink camellia’s with a box of macaroons. You can’t help but gasp at the sweet gesture.

“H, you shouldn’t have. These flowers are perfect.” You let out a happy sigh. “You’re perfect.”

“Anything to make you smile, poppet.”

“Can you come home already, so I can kiss you.” You exclaim excited.

“Well I’m happy to let you know I’ll be home in thirty.”

You let out a cheer of excitement. “Great, I have a surprise for you for when you get home.”

“Really, you didn’t have to do anything.”

“You deserve it. Hurry home. I’ll be upstairs when you get here.”

You said your I love you’s and hung up. You quickly hurried up to the bathroom to prepare a sweet bath for you both to share and relax.

You went to the basket under the sink and got a lavender bath bomb that was one of Harry’s favorites. You dropped it in and checked the water was perfect temperature before going to get some candles. You liked the atmosphere and were bumped that you didn’t have rose petals to spread in the water for an extra nice gesture.

You were tying your robe when you heard the front door opening.

“Hun, I’m in the bathroom.” You shouted hoping he heard you.

You didn’t hear his reply but you heard his steps up the stairs. He walked into the bathroom and stopped to admire the setup. The smile he gave you made your legs feel like jelly.

“Come on slow poke, get naked.” You say hanging up your robe and slipping in the warm water. You released a loud moan when you felt the warm water easing your muscles.

Harry had only gotten his shirt off before he stopped to admire the beautiful girl he got to call his. He never felt more lucky than in this moment with her. He felt her questioning stare and started undressing even faster.

He got close and motioned for her to scoot so he could go behind but she would not move.

“Let me cuddle you.” You said with a sweet smile.

He gave her a small nod paired with pink cheeks.

Harry leans back and cant help but think that this moment right here is one he will never get tired of having.

“This was the best gift, bub. I love you.” Harry grabs one of your hands resting on his tummy and brings it up to his mouth for a kiss. “Best Valentine’s Day gift.”

Harry doesn’t feel you tense up at his last words. He’s too in his thoughts to have felt it.

“uh… what?” You question because was that really today.

Harry is quick to turn around at those sounds you make. He’s shocked because how do you not know it’s the day for lovers.

“You didn’t know it was Valentine’s Day” He says slowly because he is still trying to process this.

You shake your head no and shrug.

“I’ve never really celebrated that so, I don’t know what to tell you.” You sigh bringing your hand and running it through his curls dampening them a little.

“February for me only has two important dates: My cousin Jen’s birthday that is tomorrow and your birthday, hun.” You press a kiss to his cheek to break him out of his train of thoughts.

“Wow, this is very memorable.” Harry giggles.

You feel bad for not knowing that Harry cared for this date.

“I’ll do better next year.” You promise.

Harry turns back around and leans on you once again. “I highly doubt it, Y/N.” He says as he traces the small tattoo on your wrist that always calms him down. “For now just love me.”

You drop a kiss on his shoulder. “always.”

“That’s the only reason you bought me macaroons” You say with a laugh but an accusing glare.

Harry turns around and your eyes go wide at the sudden splash of water. He leans in close you nose touching, being this close to him always leaves you breathless. He tilts his head and closes the gap connecting your lips together. His soft pink lips make you tingle everywhere.

Just like that you forget all about the macaroons.

Happy Valentine’s Day!

I had a sucky day but getting to write something definitely flipped it around. love you lots xx

something short but sweet. feedback is always welcomed ♥️

tags: will add more as I think of more
summary:
thinking of an hs2 era wishlist
bops on bops on bops (let's face it, hs1 was a little depressing, I hope you're not sad anymore...
body:
thinking of an hs2 era wishlist

  1. bops on bops on bops (let’s face it, hs1 was a little depressing, I hope you’re not sad anymore bby!)
  2. GREAT music videos give me the visuals baby, this is the shit they can play with likeeee don’t hold back and let the creativity flow
  3. sir, give me some explicit lyrics! maybe just one f bomb will be enough (literally) fuck me up harry!
  4. better/MORE US based promo that isn’t rushed
  5. give me a BTA part II please and thank!
  6. switch up your looks sir! I love the g*cci suits but g*cci has been disrespectful lately, so expanding horizons will be refreshing!
  7. SNL
  8. magazine covers, I will sell my liver for some fashion model harry!

  6. switch up your looks sir! I love the g*cci suits but g*cci has been disrespectful lately, so expanding horizons will be refreshing!
  7. SNL
  8. magazine covers, I will sell my liver for some fashion model harry!

  3. sir, give me some explicit lyrics! maybe just one f bomb will be enough (literally) fuck me up harry!

  5. give me a BTA part II please and thank!
  6. switch up your looks sir! I love the g*cci suits but g*cci has been disrespectful lately, so expanding horizons will be refreshing!
  7. SNL
  8. magazine covers, I will sell my liver for some fashion model harry!
